Name: Quest: Escape Room
About the game: Imagine your dream date with a beautiful girl. This date will goes as perfect as it can be. But then it becomes a real horror, after this girl lure you in a deadly trapâ€¦ You wake up in a closed, strange room. To get out of here you should use all available items and hints what you will find. You should find a way to hack a computer, unlock sturdy doors, find peaces of paper with password, key parts, and when find the labyrinth exit and neutralize the laboratory guard. Features: * Dark atmosphere. * Logical numerical puzzles and many mini-quest. * Gameplay with Point & Click style elements. * Pixel graphics. * Atmospheric OST. * Simple control (mouse + keyboard).
